Package fr.umlv.BabaIsYou.arena

Class PlayGround

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.BabaIsYou.arena.PlayGround
public class PlayGround
extends java.lang.Object
Class that manages the whole playground.
Author:
Diagne Ben, Kamdom Omairt

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayGround​(java.nio.file.Path path)
    Method that initializes the playground by reading the text file (that represents our level structure) located in the path taken as the method's parameter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add_decor​(Decor decor, Coordinates coordinates)
    Method that adds to the map the parameterized decor located in the parameterized coordinates.
    void add_word​(Word word, Coordinates coordinates)
    Method that adds to the map the parameterized word located in the parameterized coordinates.
    void changeDecor​(Word noun, Word property)
    Method that applies the rules to every decor sitting in the playground.

    Method that creates the level from the parameter string "line".

    Map that stores every object in the playground as keys (with their coordinates as values)

    Returns the level's height.

    Method that moves the decors controlled by the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayGround

      public PlayGround​(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Method that initializes the playground by reading the text file (that represents our level structure) located in the path taken as the method's parameter.
      Parameters:
      path - Location of the file.

  • Method Details

    • add_word

      public void add_word​(Word word, Coordinates coordinates)
      Method that adds to the map the parameterized word located in the parameterized coordinates.
      Parameters:
      word - Word to add to the map.
      coordinates - Coordinates which the word is located to.

    • add_decor

      public void add_decor​(Decor decor, Coordinates coordinates)
      Method that adds to the map the parameterized decor located in the parameterized coordinates.
      Parameters:
      decor - Decor to add to the map.
      coordinates - Coordinates which the decor is located to.

    • createLevel

      public int createLevel​(java.lang.String line)
      Method that creates the level from the parameter string "line".
      Parameters:
      line - String that represents the line currently read by the reader.
      Returns:
      1 if the process was successful, 0 otherwise.

    • playGround

      public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Word,​java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates>> playGround()
      Map that stores every word in the playground as keys (with their coordinates as values). Note: We choose LinkedHashMap so the map will not randomly sort the word we add to the map.
      Returns:
      The concerned Map.

    • decors

      public java.util.LinkedHashMap<Decor,​java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates>> decors()
      Map that stores every object in the playground as keys (with their coordinates as values)
      Returns:
      The concerned Map.

    • youWon

      public boolean youWon()
      Returns the current state of the game: Returns true if the player won, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The concerned boolean.

    • youLose

      public boolean youLose()
      Returns the current state of the game: Returns true if the player lost, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The concerned boolean.

    • width

      public int width()
      Returns the level's width.
      Returns:
      The level's width.

    • height

      public int height()
      Returns the level's height.
      Returns:
      The level's height.

    • update

      public void update()
      Recurring method that actualizes the playground by applying the rules.

    • move_player

      public void move_player​(Directions direction)
      Method that moves the decors controlled by the player. Also pushes the nearby decors if they can be pushed.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction the player takes to move.

    • verif_limite

      boolean verif_limite​(Directions direction, Coordinates coordinates)
      Establishes the playground's boundaries.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction the moving object has taken.
      coordinates - Coordinates of the moving object.
      Returns:
      True if the player hasn't reached the boundary, False otherwise.

    • verif_passable

      boolean verif_passable​(Directions direction, Coordinates coordinates)
      Checks if there's a decor located in the parameterized coordinates that the player can pass.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction the method is looking at.
      coordinates - Coordinates of the object.
      Returns:
      True if there's a decor located in the parameterized coordinates that the player can pass, False otherwise.

    • push_word

      int push_word​(Directions direction, Coordinates coordinates)
      Recursive method that allows the words to be pushed by the player or by another pushable object.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction the moving word is getting pushed to.
      coordinates - Coordinates of the object who's pushing the moving word.
      Returns:
      1 if the push was successful, 0 otherwise.

    • push_decor

      int push_decor​(Directions direction, Coordinates coordinates)
      Recursive method that allows the pushable decors to be pushed by the player or by another pushable object.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction the moving decor is getting pushed to.
      coordinates - Coordinates of the object who's pushing the moving decor.
      Returns:
      1 if the push was successful, 0 otherwise.

    • push

      void push​(Coordinates coordinates, Directions direction)
      Method that reunites every pushing method to allow the player to move and interact with pushable objects.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates of the player who pushes.
      direction - Direction the player is taking to move.

    • sentence

      public void sentence()
      Checks in the whole playground if there are existing sentences. If it is the case, it calls the changeDecor method.

    • changeDecor

      public void changeDecor​(Word noun, Word property)
      Method that applies the rules to every decor sitting in the playground.
      Parameters:
      noun - Name in the sentence
      property - Property in the sentence

    • win

      public boolean win()
      Checks in the playground if the player won.
      Returns:
      True if the player won, False otherwise.

    • lose

      public boolean lose()
      Checks in the playground if the player lost.
      Returns:
      True if the player lost, False otherwise.

    • verif_sink

      public void verif_sink()
      Applies the sink property.

    • verif_defeat

      public void verif_defeat()
      Applies the defeat property.

    • verif_melt

      public void verif_melt()
      Applies the melt property.
